title: Manchester United hand pro deal to goalkeeper Matej Kovar
description: Manchester United have signed young goalkeeper Matej Kovar from FC Slovacko.
content: The 17-year-old has signed a professional contract with the club, having reportedly spent a week training with the academy in November.Kovar also had a trial at West Ham but has been snapped up by United, who have reconfigured their academy under former midfielder Nicky Butt.Announcing the Kovar signing, the Manchester United website said: "The 17-year-old is a talented young goalkeeper who has already appeared for Czech Republic's U18s on two occasions, highlighting his promising pedigree and excellent potential."An exciting prospect, Kovar has signed a professional contract with the club and will soon join the ranks of the Academy, specifically with Kieran McKenna's impressive U18s team."
dbpedia: The 17-year-old has signed a professional contract with the club, having reportedly spent a week training with the academy in November.Kovar also had a trial at West Ham but has been snapped up by United, who have reconfigured their academy under former midfielder Nicky Butt.Announcing the Kovar signing, the Manchester United website said: "The 17-year-old is a talented young goalkeeper who has already appeared for Czech Republic's U18s on two occasions, highlighting his promising pedigree and excellent potential."An exciting prospect, Kovar has signed a professional contract with the club and will soon join the ranks of the Academy, specifically with Kieran McKenna's impressive U18s team."
